tables.table_schema: Transactions(transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT, amount FLOAT, transaction_date TIMESTAMP)
Users(user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(50), email VARCHAR(50), created_at TIMESTAMP)
Products(product_id INT PRIMARY KEY, product_name VARCHAR(50), price FLOAT, category VARCHAR(50))
TransactionLogs(log_id INT PRIMARY KEY, transaction_id INT, user_id INT, log_description TEXT, log_time TIMESTAMP)

CREATE TABLE TransactionLog (
    log_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_id UUID REFERENCES TransactionHistory(transaction_id),
    user_id UUID REFERENCES UserAccount(user_id),
    merchant_id UUID REFERENCES Merchant(merchant_id),
    method_id UUID REFERENCES PaymentMethod(method_id),
    status VARCHAR,
    processed_at TIMESTAMP
);
